description: Fujiyama Okometsubu was a perfectly normal high school student. Having constantly transferred schools, he`d never had a chance to make good friends. He hoped to change that now, at Wakame High School. Surely, he would be able to make a 100 friends! Alas, the first friend he makes is http://anidb.net/ch19750 [Hananakajima Masaru], and it all goes downhill from there ...
name: Fujiyama Okometsubu
